alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Stark (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 5:19PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Marshall and east central Stark Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 519 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Camp Grove, or 12 miles west of Lacon, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sparland, Lacon and Henry. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
